alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Monroe; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 12:11PM CDT until July 21 at 12:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Woodruff County in eastern Arkansas... Southeastern Jackson County in eastern Arkansas... North central Monroe County in eastern Arkansas... * Until 1245 PM CDT. * At 1211 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Patterson, or near Augusta, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Patterson... Tupelo... Hunter... McCrory... Cotton Plant... Fargo... Becton... Howell... Penrose... Grays... Fitzhugh... Pumpkin Bend... Morton... Hilleman... Zent... Wiville... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
